content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 15}, {"type": "diamond_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 41, "index": 18}, {"type": "orange_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 36, "index": 26}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 55, "index": 27}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 35, "index": 32}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 59, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 40, "index": 35}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 41, "index": 36}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a purpur_pillar, I need to place 2 purpur_slab side by side in the crafting grid. I will move 1 purpur_slab from slot 37 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 15}, {"type": "diamond_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 41, "index": 18}, {"type": "orange_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 36, "index": 26}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 55, "index": 27}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 35, "index": 32}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 59, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 40, "index": 35}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 41, "index": 36}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I need to place another purpur_slab to the right of the first one. I will move the purpur_slab from slot 37 to slot 4.
act: move from slot 37 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 15}, {"type": "diamond_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 41, "index": 18}, {"type": "orange_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 36, "index": 26}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 55, "index": 27}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 35, "index": 32}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 59, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 40, "index": 35}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 41, "index": 36}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I can craft the purpur_pillar by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
